trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration information used by <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
The message filter table to use for this configuration.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default is <see langword="true" />.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> and routeOnHeadersOnly parameter.
Gets a value that indicates whether messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent.
<see langword="true" /> if messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si los mensajes se va a enviar en el orden en que se enviaron; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> used by this configuration.
The message filter table.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filter can examine the message body.
<see langword="true" /> if the filter can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si el filtro s√≥lo puede examinar los encabezados del mensaje; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is **true**.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages should be processed between SOAP <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />s.
<see langword="true" /> if messages should be processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si se deben procesar los mensajes; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
SOAP processing is the process where messages are converted between SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.
trans-unit.target: El procesamiento SOAP es el proceso donde los mensajes se convierten entre clases <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> de SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value to `false` indicates that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> should not install the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on the client endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Establecer este valor en `false` indica que la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> no deben instalar los <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> en los puntos de conexi√≥n de cliente.

trans-unit.source: If set to `false`, you must add your own message inspector or other code to handle some aspects of messages before they are sent.
trans-unit.target: Si establece en `false`, debe agregar su propios inspector de mensaje u otro c√≥digo para controlar algunos aspectos de los mensajes antes de enviarlos.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to disable SOAP processing on each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Tambi√©n es posible deshabilitar el procesamiento SOAP en cada punto de conexi√≥n.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> class.

By default, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> creates and attaches a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> set to `true` for each client endpoint.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> crea y asocia una nueva <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> con <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> establecido en `true` para cada punto de conexi√≥n de cliente.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on a specific endpoint, create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with this value set to `false` and then attach it to the endpoint on which you do not want processing to occur.
trans-unit.target: Si no desea usar el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> en un extremo espec√≠fico, cree una nueva <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> con este valor establecido en `false` y, a continuaci√≥n, adjuntarlo al punto de conexi√≥n en el que no desea que el procesamiento para que se producen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observes that a client already has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, it does not attempt to attach another.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observa que un cliente ya tiene un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, no intenta adjuntar otro.

trans-unit.source: To disable the application of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on any endpoint, disable SOAP processing on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: Para deshabilitar la aplicaci√≥n de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> en cualquier punto de conexi√≥n, deshabilite el procesamiento SOAP en el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> y <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> is added to the client endpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A> es `true`, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> se agrega al extremo del cliente <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> colecci√≥n.
